title: U.S. ambassador to EU Sondland told not to testify in House impeachment inquiry: reports
text: Gordon Sondland, the U.S. ambassador to the European Union, has been ordered by the State Department not to testify Tuesday before a House committee, reports said. House investigators were scheduled to take a deposition from Sondland about text messages he exchanged with President Donald Trump's former special envoy to Ukraine. The messages related to Trump's July phone call with the Ukrainian president and the freezing of foreign aid. The call and Trump's pressure on Ukraine to investigate former Vice President Joe Biden is central to Democrats' impeachment inquiry.
description: Gordon Sondland, the U.S. ambassador to the European Union, has been ordered by the State Department not to testify Tuesday before a House committee, reports...
